remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated turbine cooling valve remains open.

note.para: SB 75-123 has been accomplished on all engines on acft 570 - 579 and EEC software has been verified to be 8.2Q or later, therefore, no maintenance procedure other than placarding is necessary.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Increase flight planning fuel by 0.1% for each affected engine.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "ENG ___ TURBINE COOLING AIR SYS INOP OPEN". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
